a.span: DISTANCE LEARNING HELPDESK FOR TEACHERS, PARENTS AND STUDENTS

div.p: CLICK ON THE ARTICLE TITLE TO ACCESS THE LINK TO RECEIVE HELPDESK SUPPORT FOR DISTANCE LEARNING.

a.title: Go to comments for DISTANCE LEARNING HELPDESK FOR TEACHERS, PARENTS AND STUDENTS

img.alt: We want to hear from you.

a.span: WE WANT TO HEAR FROM YOU!

div.p: If you have any questions for the Board of Education or would like to leave feedback on Distance Learning, please click on the article title to access those links to do so.

a.title: Go to comments for WE WANT TO HEAR FROM YOU!

div.p: Hauppauge High School Principal, Chris Cook, and his staff are missing their students! Click on the article title to get to the link to an awesome hello from them!

a.title: Go to comments for HELLO FROM HAUPPAUGE HIGH SCHOOL!

div.p: PUBLIC NOTICE BUSINESS MEETING OF THE BOARD OF EDUCATION OF THE HAUPPAUGE UNION FREE SCHOOL DISTRICT April 21, 2020 7:30 p.m. As authorized by Executive Order No. 202.1, signed by Governor Andrew M. Cuomo on March 12, 2020, the Board of Education of the Hauppauge Union Free School District will hold a Special Meeting on April 21, 2020 at 7:30 p.m. remotely by videoconference and/or telephone conference and the public will not be permitted to attend the meeting in-person. It is anticipated that at 7:30 p.m. the Board will make a motion for the purpose of adjourning into executive session and that at approximately 8:00 p.m. the Board of Education will reconvene in public session. The public will be able to view and/or listen to the meeting by joining "Facebook Live" which will be broadcast from the "Hauppauge Public School District Official" Facebook page which can be reached with the following web address: https://www.facebook.com/HPSEagles/. It is anticipated that the public participation portion of the meeting will be suspended.

a.title: Go to comments for BOARD OF EDUCATION MEETING - APRIL 21, 2020

a.span: POSTPONED - NYS SCHOOL BUDGET VOTE AND BOARD OF EDUCATION ELECTION

div.p: “Due to Executive Order No 202.13, the NYS School Budget Vote and Board of Education Election which was previously scheduled for May 19, 2020 is postponed. As soon as we receive more information from the Governor’s Office we will update the community.“

a.title: Go to comments for POSTPONED - NYS SCHOOL BUDGET VOTE AND BOARD OF EDUCATION ELECTION

span.strong: Board of Education Meetings and Presentations

p.span: The Board of Education welcomes and encourages community participation. Click here to view the 2019-2020 BOE Meeting Schedule and accompanying presentations. If there is any topic a community member would like to see presented at a future meeting, please send that request to boardofed@hauppauge.k12.ny.us

div.p: Copyright Notice: No materials on any of Hauppauge School District’s web pages may be copied without express written permission.

The Hauppauge School District endeavors to maintain a website that is accessible to all individuals, including those with visual, hearing or cognitive disabilities. If the format of any material on the District's current website interferes with your ability to access information and you require an accommodation, please contact website@hauppauge.k12.ny.us.
